I would like to end you average dispute...What was originally done...was a weighted average. Look it up on wiki or smth...

3/4*8=0.75*8=6
1/4*2=0.25*2=0.5

Because the sum of the weights (0.75 and 0.25) add up you one...you don't divide by anything...the overall film average is: 6 + 0.5 = 6.5
